hterm_pref_mouse_paste_button.message:
The mouse button to use for pasting.

For autodetect, we'll use the middle mouse button for non-X11 platforms (including Chrome OS). On X11, we'll use the right mouse button (since the window manager should paste via the middle mouse button).

0 == left (primary) button.
1 == middle (auxiliary) button.
2 == right (secondary) button.

This option is independent of the setting for right-click paste.

Note: This will handle left & right handed mice correctly.
